-- 개체 이름: TJMES.SP_LOSS_CODE_INF
-- 만든 날짜 : 2013-05-04 오후 5:44:56
-- 마지막으로 수정한 날짜 : 2013-05-04 오후 6:03:35
-- 상태 : VALID
------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE TJMES.SP_LOSS_CODE_INF
 IS
 LOSSCODE_CNT	NUMBER(10);
 CURRENT_DOMAIN	VARCHAR2(64);
BEGIN
	SELECT DOMAIN_ID INTO CURRENT_DOMAIN FROM CURRENT_WORK_DATE;
  CURRENT_DOMAIN := CURRENT_DOMAIN;

	BEGIN
  	FOR CUR_ORD IN (
    	SELECT ILC.LOSS_CODE AS NAME,
				ILC.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION
			FROM INF_LOSS_CODE ILC WHERE ILC.DOWNLOAD_YN  = 'N' AND ILC.VALDATE < SYSDATE
		)

    LOOP

    	BEGIN
      	SELECT COUNT(*) INTO LOSSCODE_CNT FROM LOSS_CODES WHERE NAME = CUR_ORD.NAME;

        IF(LOSSCODE_CNT = 0) THEN

         	INSERT INTO
          	LOSS_CODES(
            	ID
            	, DOMAIN_ID
             	, NAME
             	, DESCRIPTION
              , CREATED_AT
              , UPDATED_AT
            )
          VALUES (
          	CONCAT(CONCAT(CURRENT_DOMAIN, '-'), CUR_ORD.NAME)
           	, CURRENT_DOMAIN
           	, CUR_ORD.NAME
            , CUR_ORD.DESCRIPTION
            , SYSDATE
            , SYSDATE
          );

          UPDATE
        		INF_LOSS_CODE
        	SET
        		DOWNLOAD_YN  = 'Y'
    				, DOWNLOAD_TIME = SYSDATE
        	WHERE
        		LOSS_CODE = CUR_ORD.NAME
          	AND DESCRIPTION = CUR_ORD.DESCRIPTION;

        ELSE
					UPDATE
        		INF_LOSS_CODE
        	SET
        		DOWNLOAD_YN  = 'S'
    				, DOWNLOAD_TIME = SYSDATE
        	WHERE
        		LOSS_CODE = CUR_ORD.NAME
          	AND DESCRIPTION = CUR_ORD.DESCRIPTION;
        END IF;


      EXCEPTION
        	WHEN OTHERS THEN
          DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE('# ERROR1 : ' || TO_CHAR(SQLCODE));
          	ROLLBACK;
        END;

    END LOOP;

    COMMIT;

  EXCEPTION
  	WHEN OTHERS THEN
    DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE('# ERROR2 : ' || TO_CHAR(SQLCODE));
    	ROLLBACK;
  END;
END SP_LOSS_CODE_INF;
